New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored a half-century and Arshdeep Singh took four wickets in the match

Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Jones praised the team's discipline and effort
Rohit Sharma expressed relief at qualifying for the Super Eights
Arshdeep Singh was awarded the player of the match
